keyword: calories in an in and out burger
title: Calories in an In-N-Out Burger
meta_description: Learn calories in an in and out burger: about 390 kcal per standard hamburger, plus full macros, sodium, and tweaks for variations like cheese or no bun.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out hamburger: bun, 100% beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread; no cheese or customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, and custom orders. Values based on official In-N-Out data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One standard In-N-Out burger provides ~390 kcal, 16 g protein, and 39 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging or apps.

tweaks.label: No bun (protein style, wrapped in lettuce)

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: A standard In-N-Out hamburger has 390 calories.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: About 16 g of protein per burger from the beef patty.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: Approximately 730 mg of sodium, mostly from the bun and spread.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: Yes, 39 g total carbs, including 3 g fiber and 10 g sugars from the spread.

faqs.q: How does adding cheese affect calories in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: Adding cheese increases it by about 80 kcal to 470 total.
